abstract: The DBS Group, Southeast Asia’s biggest bank, said Wednesday that it had hired Richard Stanley, the chief executive of Citigroup China, as chief executive to revive its China business and expand outside Singapore.
lead_paragraph: The DBS Group, Southeast Asia’s biggest bank, said Wednesday that it had hired Richard Stanley, the chief executive of Citigroup China, as chief executive to revive its China business and expand outside Singapore.

headline.main: DBS Appoints Citigroup China Head to C.E.O. Post
